questions.prompt: Write the syntax for trimming whitespace from both ends of a string stored in text.
questions.explanation: trim() removes whitespace from the start and end of a string.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for converting a string stored in word to uppercase.
questions.explanation: toUpperCase() returns a new string with all characters in uppercase.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for converting a string stored in word to lowercase.
questions.explanation: toLowerCase() returns a new string with all characters in lowercase.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for splitting a string sentence into an array of words separated by spaces.
questions.explanation: split() divides a string into an array based on a separator.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for replacing the first occurrence of 'dog' with 'cat' in text.
questions.explanation: replace() substitutes the first match of a substring or regex.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for checking if text starts with 'Hello'.
questions.explanation: startsWith() returns true if the string begins with the given substring.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for checking if text ends with 'world'.
questions.explanation: endsWith() returns true if the string ends with the given substring.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for repeating a string word 3 times.
questions.explanation: repeat() returns a new string repeated the given number of times.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for checking if text includes 'code'.
questions.explanation: includes() returns true if the substring is found.

questions.prompt: Write the syntax for accessing the last character of text using at().
questions.explanation: at() allows negative indices to access characters from the end.
